name: Pale Blue Sphere
description:
Press TAB or P to pause.

An unfinished game made by two noob programmers. Sorry you can't change the sensitivity or invert the axis! Thanks for playing.

If you want to read our GDD, here's our attempt at it.

All the programming was done by us: 

  • Lead - Andrew "drw" Esberto 
  • Not Lead - Joel K Johnson

Assets used:

  • Synty Studios (3D - Prototype Pack)
  • Game Master Audio (SFX - Scifi Sounds/Weapons)
  • Zach Striefel (SFX - CasualGameSFX Pack)
  • Audio Alchemist (Music - Horror Music pack/ RPG Battle Themes)
  • Muz Station Productions (Music - Mega Game Music Collection)

Please ignore the FPS counter we forgot to take off.

:)
